UPDATE EST_GUEST_HOUSE_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_GUEST_HOUSE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
